episode.content: Mainly works as a director on live-action commercials. At 43, he began working on original stop-motion animated works. In addition to writing and directing, he also works with art, animation, puppet-modeling and more. He's a nature-loving Akita Prefecture-born creator who currently lives in Karuizawa. He aims to create textured visuals unique only to stop-motion animation.
episode.description: Yashiro began creating stop-motion films at 43 while working as a CM director. The nature-loving Akita-born creator currently lives in Karuizawa, also working with art, puppet-modeling, and more.
episode.subtitle: A Stop-Motion Fantasy Full of Nature
episode.title: Anime Supernova

episode.content: Coming from a live-action film background, Iwaisawa is almost entirely self-taught in animation production. He continues to move up in the animation world and separate himself from other animators through self-developed techniques. Iwaisawa specializes in rotoscope, an animation technique that is based on tracing over live-action footage. The painstaking work leads to highly detailed images that come to life in ways not seen in traditional animation. We will introduce you to the one-of-a-kind, internationally-acclaimed world of Iwaisawa Kenji.
episode.description: Iwaisawa Kenji is a self-taught creator who uses a technique called rotoscoping to produce one-of-a-kind animated works. Watch and get lost in the fantastical worlds of a visionary creator.
episode.subtitle: Aiming for an Academy Award! A Creator Taking on Unprecedented Challenges
episode.title: Anime Supernova
